content: *a weekend project to keep you cozy and warm* kits are available to make the same throw 1 size width 41 ½ 46 ¾ / 105 119 cm length 44 55 / 112 140 cm our sample photographed is the larger size materials 504 630 yards / 475 576 meters super-bulky weight 10% buffer has been added to amount we used cape may fiber super bulky superwash merino 100% superwash merino wool 126 yards/ 225 gram bright colors sample use one skein of each in colors… flip flop crustacean polished shell seaweed sedna **tools** - us size 19 15mm 32 or longer circular knitting needle - darning needle - scissors **gauge** 6 sts 9 row = 4 10 cm in st st after blocking adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge 1 https //capemayfiber com/products/waffle-stitch-throw-kit 2 https //yarncentrick com/
